text: Bar mitzvah (Hebrew: בַּר מִצְוָה) is a Jewish coming of age ritual for boys. Bar Mitzvah can also refer to: *Bar mitzvah attack, an attack on the SSL/TLS protocols that exploits the use of the RC4 cipher with weak keys for that cipher *Bar Mitzvah Boy, British television play on the BBC based on a script by Jack Rosenthal **Bar Mitzvah Boy (musical), a musical based on above ==See also== *Bat Mitzvah (disambiguation) *The Black Bar Mitzvah, 2012 mixtape by American rapper Rick Ross *Ruin Jonny's Bar Mitzvah, 2004 live album by Me First and the Gimme Gimmes *Adult bar mitzvah, a bar mitzvah of a person older than the customary age
title: Bar Mitzvah (disambiguation)
